trans:
-Translate the word "Goofy" to "Nervous" which the meaning in that context was not close at all
-Another question asked by many international fans was when Milk told about the situation on the plane when someone said that they looked alike and misunderstood that they were twins, but the MC said that, "Or are you couple?". This made international fans misunderstand that the MC translated from what she said.
Actually, you did very well in the MC part. However, I felt that if the event had a lot of international fans and your interpretation skills were not that good, it would be better to hire an interpreter who specialized in translation and provided complete localized translation on the stage. In my opinion, a person who did very well in the part of interpreter and MC was a woman at the event in Tokyo. She could translate everything from what she said and provided a complete localized translation in Thai and Japanese. So everything turned out very smooth and perfectly. As for Vietnam, there were one MC and one Interpreter, which the event turned out smoothly. Nothing is wrong.
Lastly, if you read this, I want to thank you for listening to the feedback.  I hope there will be better improvements in the future event. üôèüèª
